Increase = (PV x 5%) / (1 - (1 + r)^(-n))

* r = rate of return (5% in this case)
* n = number of years (30 years in this case)

Increase = ($2,000,000 x 5%) / (1 - (1 + 0.05)^(-30))
= $100,000 / 0.6879
= $147,000
